Module it.polimi.ingsw.am43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Model.Cards

Class CardSide

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Model.Cards.CardSide
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BackSide, GoldFrontSide, ResourceFrontSide
public class CardSide extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the side of a Card. It contains the ID the card obtains once deployed, the array of Corners of the side and the PointsRule. It also contains the relative coordinates that the card-side has, with respect to the starting card.
See Also:
